hibernate-mapping.query: select ratingScaleGroup from omis.assessment.domain.RatingScaleGroup ratingScaleGroup where ratingScaleGroup.scaleName = :name
select ratingScaleGroup from omis.assessment.domain.RatingScaleGroup ratingScaleGroup where ratingScaleGroup.scaleName = :name and ratingScaleGroup <> :excludedRatingScaleGroup

select distinct ratingScaleGroup from omis.assessment.domain.RatingScaleGroupAnswer ratingScaleGroupAnswer inner join ratingScaleGroupAnswer.scaleGroup ratingScaleGroup inner join ratingScaleGroupAnswer.answerRating answerRating, omis.questionnaire.domain.AdministeredQuestionValue administeredQuestionValue where answerRating.answerValue = administeredQuestionValue.answerValue and answerRating.ratingCategory = :ratingCategory and administeredQuestionValue.administeredQuestionnaire = :administeredQuestionnaire
